title: Spending Tracker
description: Through my personal project, I have developed skills in data collection, visualization, and analysis. I created an interactive spending tracker that automatically adds entries to a Google Sheet, including dates, times, and payment methods. I also generated bar charts to visually track my spending patterns and identify areas of overspending.

title: Regression Project for Predicting Insulin Resistance
description: Used a dataset containing measurements relating to pregnancy, glucose, blood pressure, skin thickness, BMI, diabetes pedigree function, and age to predict prognosis of Insulin Resistance.

title: Connect 4 In C
description: I implemented Connect 4 which runs in the command line. There are options to play multiplayer or against a rudimentary AI with different degrees of difficulty. There is also an option to watch the AI play against itself based on where the user puts the first piece.

title: Basic Image Processing App in Python
description: The project involved implementing classes for RGB images, image processing templates, and image classification using a K-nearest Neighbors (KNN) algorithm. Can perform simple image manipulation like inversion and crop

title: Battleship in C
description: I implemented Battleship which runs on a GUI. Multiplayer only and is adapted to work on separate devices over a LAN.

title: Monte Carlo Simulations for Risk Analysis
description: Simulated stock price movements using Monte Carlo methods to assess investment risks.

title: Graph Theory Application in Social Networks
description: Used graph theory to analyze and visualize social network connections, identifying central users and clusters.

title: Personal Blog Setup
description: Implemented a personal blog with custom themes and layout options.

title: Server-Side Scripting Lab
description: Practiced building and deploying a simple server-side application.

title: Social Media Mockup
description: Created wireframes and mockups for a potential new social media platform.

title: E-commerce Redesign
description: Redesigned a sample e-commerce site to improve user experience.

title: AI Chatbot Experiment
description: Implemented a simple AI-powered chatbot using natural language processing.
